3 #include <unicorn/unicorn_statemachine.h>

5 int main(int argc, char **argv)
6 {
7  ros::init(argc, argv, "unicorn_statemachine");
8  UnicornState statemachine;
9  statemachine.printUsage();
10  ros::Rate r(50);
11  while(ros::ok())
12  {
13  statemachine.active();
14  ros::spinOnce();
15  r.sleep();
16  }
17  return 0;
18 }

20 PidController::PidController(float Kp, float Ki, float Kd, float tolerance)
21 : Kp_(Kp), Ki_(Ki), Kd_(Kd), tolerance_(tolerance)
22 {
23  total_error_ = 0;
24  previous_error_ = 0;
25 }
26 
27 void PidController::setLimit(double lower, double upper)
28 {
29  lower_limit_ = lower;
30  upper_limit_ = upper;
31 }
32 
33 float PidController::limit(float term)
34 {
35  if (term < lower_limit_)
36  {
37  return lower_limit_;
38  }
39  else if (term > upper_limit_)
40  {
41  return upper_limit_;
42  }
43  return term;
44 }
45 
46 void PidController::control(float& var, float error)
47 {
48  float pidterm;
49  if (error < tolerance_)
50  {
51  total_error_ = 0;
52  }
53  total_error_ += error;
54  pidterm = error * Kp_ + total_error_ * Ki_ + (error-previous_error_) * Kd_;
55  previous_error_ = error;
56  var = limit(pidterm);
57 }

59 RefuseBin::RefuseBin()
60 {
61  x = 8.0;
62  y = -2.0;
63  yaw = 0;
64 }

70  range_ = 2.0;

86 UnicornState::UnicornState()
87 : move_base_clt_("move_base", true)
88 {
89  bool run_global_loc, sim_time;
90  std::string odom_topic;
91  if (!n_.getParam("use_sim_time", sim_time))
92  {
93  sim_time = false;
94  }
95  ROS_INFO("sim_time: %i", sim_time);
96 
97  if(!n_.getParam("max_angular_vel", MAX_ANGULAR_VEL))
98  {
99  MAX_ANGULAR_VEL = 0.5;
100  }
101  ROS_INFO("MAX_ANGULAR_VEL: %f", MAX_ANGULAR_VEL);
102  if(!n_.getParam("max_linear_vel", MAX_LINEAR_VEL))
103  {
104  MAX_LINEAR_VEL = 0.3;
105  }
106  ROS_INFO("MAX_LINEAR_VEL: %f", MAX_LINEAR_VEL);
107  if (!n_.getParam("odometry_topic", odom_topic))
108  {
109  odom_topic = "odom";
110  }
111  if (!n_.getParam("frame_id", frame_id_))
112  {
113  frame_id_ = "base_link";
114  }
115 
116  ROS_INFO("[unicorn_statemachine] Robot frame_id: %s", frame_id_.c_str());
117  ROS_INFO("[unicorn_statemachine] Listening to %s", odom_topic.c_str());
118 
119  move_base_cancel_pub_ = n_.advertise<actionlib_msgs::GoalID>("/move_base/cancel", 0);
120  amcl_global_clt_ = n_.serviceClient<std_srvs::Empty>("/global_localization");
121  cmd_vel_pub_ = n_.advertise<geometry_msgs::Twist>("/unicorn/cmd_vel", 0);
122  lift_pub_ =n_.advertise<std_msgs::Int8>("/lift",0);
123  lift_publisher =n_.advertise<std_msgs::Int8>("/Lifting",0);//ADDED BY MUJI
124  lift_subscriber = n_.subscribe("Lifting", 0, &UnicornState::LiftCallback, this);
125  odom_sub_ = n_.subscribe(odom_topic.c_str(), 0, &UnicornState::odomCallback, this);
126  acc_cmd_srv_ = n_.advertiseService("cmd_charlie", &UnicornState::accGoalServer, this);
127  bumper_sub_ = n_.subscribe("rearBumper",0, &UnicornState::bumperCallback, this);
128 
129  if(sim_time)
130  {
131  range_sensor_list_["ultrasonic_bm"] = new RangeSensor("ultrasonic_bm");
132  }
133  else
134  {
135  range_sensor_list_["ultrasonic_bmr"] = new RangeSensor("ultrasonic_bmr");
136  range_sensor_list_["ultrasonic_bml"] = new RangeSensor("ultrasonic_bml");
137 }
138 
139 
140  n_.getParam("global_local", run_global_loc);
141  if (run_global_loc)
142  {
143  globalLocalization();
144  }
145 
146  state_ = current_state::MANUAL;
147  loading_state_ = current_state::ALIGNING;
148  move_base_active_ = 0;
149  velocity_pid_ = new PidController(0.3, 0.1, 0.0 ,0.05);
150  velocity_pid_->setLimit(-0.3, 0.3);
151 
152 }
153 
154 void UnicornState::globalLocalization()
155 {
156  std_srvs::Empty srv;
157  ros::service::waitForService("/global_localization", 1);
158 
159  if (amcl_global_clt_.call(srv))
160  {
161  ROS_INFO("[am_unicorn_interface]: Initialized amcl global localization");
162  }
163  else
164  {
165  ROS_ERROR("[am_unicorn_interface]: Failed to initialize amcl global localization");
166  }
167 }
168 
169 int UnicornState::getCharacter()
170 {
171  static struct termios oldt, newt;
172  tcgetattr( STDIN_FILENO, &oldt); // save old settings
173  newt = oldt;
174  newt.c_lflag &= ~(ICANON); // disable buffering
175  newt.c_cc[VMIN] = 0; newt.c_cc[VTIME] = 0;
176  tcsetattr( STDIN_FILENO, TCSANOW, &newt); // apply new settings
177 
178  int c = getchar(); // read character (non-blocking)
179 
180  tcsetattr( STDIN_FILENO, TCSANOW, &oldt); // restore old settings
181  return c;
182 }

184 std::string UnicornState::stateToString(int state)
185 {
186  switch(state)
187  {
188  case current_state::AUTONOMOUS:
189  return "AUTONOMOUS";
190 
191  case current_state::MANUAL:
192  return "MANUAL";
193 
194  case current_state::LOADING:
195  return "LOADING";
196 
197  case current_state::IDLE:
198  return "IDLE";
199 
200  case current_state::LIFT:
201  return "LIFT";
202 
203  case current_state::REVERSING:
204  return "REVERSING";
205 
206  case current_state::ALIGNING:
207  return "ALIGNING";
208 
209  case current_state::ENTERING:
210  return "ENTERING";
211 
212  case current_state::EXITING:
213  return "EXITING";
214 
215  default:
216  return "INVALID STATE";
217 
218 
219  }
220 }

222 int UnicornState::getInput(float& val)
223 {
224  float tmp;
225  if ( !(std::cin >> tmp) )
226  {
227  std::cin.clear();
228  std::cin.ignore();
229  ROS_ERROR("Incorrect entry. Try again.");
230  printUsage();
231  return 0;
232  }
233  val = tmp;
234  return 1;
235 }

237 bool UnicornState::accGoalServer(unicorn::CharlieCmd::Request &req, unicorn::CharlieCmd::Response &res)
238 {
239  if (state_ == current_state::MANUAL)
240  {
241  res.response = 0;
242  return false;
243  }
244  if(sendGoal(req.goal.x, req.goal.y, req.goal.theta))
245  {
246  res.response = 1;
247  }
248  else
249  {
250  res.response = 0;
251  }
252 }
253 
254 void UnicornState::processKey(int c)
255 {
256  float x,y,yaw;
257  if (c == 'h')
258  {
259  cancelGoal();
260  }
261  else if (c == 'l')
262  {
263  globalLocalization();
264  }
265  else if (c == '1')
266  {
267  if (state_ == current_state::MANUAL)
268  {
269  ROS_ERROR("Manual drive is active!");
270  }
271  else
272  {
273  std::cout << "Target x: ";
274  if(!getInput(x))
275  {
276 
277  return;
278  }
279  std::cout << "Target y: ";
280  if(!getInput(y))
281  {
282 
283  return;
284  }
285  std::cout << "Target yaw: ";
286  if(!getInput(yaw))
287  {
288 
289  return;
290  }
291  target_x_= x;
292  target_y_= y;
293  target_yaw_ = yaw;
294  sendGoal(x,y,yaw);
295  state_ = current_state::AUTONOMOUS;
296  printUsage();
297  }
298  }
299  else if (c == '2')
300  {
301  cancelGoal();
302  state_ = current_state::IDLE;
303  printUsage();
304  }
305  else if (c == '3')
306  {
307  cancelGoal();
308  move_base_active_ = 0;
309  state_ = current_state::MANUAL;
310  man_cmd_vel_.angular.z = 0;
311  man_cmd_vel_.linear.x = 0;
312  printUsage();
313  }
314  else if (c == '4')
315  {
316  std::cout << "Refuse bin x: ";
317  if(!getInput(refuse_bin_pose_.x))
318  return;
319  std::cout << "Refuse bin y: ";
320  if(!getInput(refuse_bin_pose_.y))
321  return;
322  std::cout << "Refuse bin yaw: ";
323  if(!getInput(refuse_bin_pose_.yaw))
324  return;
325  // state_ = current_state::LOADING;
326  state_ = current_state::ALIGNING;
327  //loading_state_ = current_state::ALIGNING;
328 // man_cmd_vel_.angular.z = 0;
329 // man_cmd_vel_.linear.x = 0;
330  printUsage();
331  }
332  else if (c == '5')
333  {
334  std::cout << "Target x: ";
335  if(!getInput(x))
336  return;
337  std::cout << "Target y: ";
338  if(!getInput(y))
339  return;
340  std::cout << "Target yaw: ";
341  if(!getInput(yaw))
342  return;
343  sendMoveCmd(x,y,yaw);
344  state_ = current_state::AUTONOMOUS;
345  printUsage();
346  }
347  else if (c =='6')
348  {
349  state_ = current_state::LIFT;// Changed from ALIGNING TO LIFT BY MUJI
350  }
351  else if (c =='7')
352  {
353  state_ = current_state::ALIGNING;
354  }
355 }
356 
357 void UnicornState::printUsage()
358 {
359  std::cout << "------------------- State: " << stateToString(state_).c_str() << " -------------------" << std::endl
360  << "1: Specify new goal 2: Idle mode 3: Manual control 4: Init Load 5: Send command 6: Lift" << std::endl
361  << "H: Pause execution L: Init global localization" << std::endl;// ADDED OPTTION 6 BY MUJI
362 }
363 
364 void UnicornState::odomCallback(const nav_msgs::Odometry& msg)
365 {
366  tf::Pose pose;
367  tf::poseMsgToTF(msg.pose.pose, pose);
368  current_yaw_ = tf::getYaw(pose.getRotation());
369  current_vel_ = msg.twist.twist.linear.x;
370 }
371 
372 void UnicornState::bumperCallback(const std_msgs::Bool& pushed_msg)
373 {
374 
375  /* bumpsensor activated and stop the agent */
376  bumperPressed_ = 0;
377 
378  if (pushed_msg.data == true)
379  {
380  if ((state_ == current_state::AUTONOMOUS) || (state_ == current_state::ALIGNING) || (state_ == current_state::ENTERING))
381  {
382  bumperPressed_ = 1;
383  ROS_INFO("BUMPER IS PUSHED");
384  cancelGoal();
385  man_cmd_vel_.angular.z = 0;
386  man_cmd_vel_.linear.x = 0;
387  }
388  }
389 
390  if (reversing_ == 0)
391  {
392  if (pushed_msg.data == false)
393  {
394  if ((state_ == current_state::AUTONOMOUS) || (state_ == current_state::ALIGNING) || (state_ == current_state::ENTERING))
395 
396  {
397  /* resends the old goal that was cancelled due to bumpsensor */
398  bumperPressed_ = 0;
399  sendGoal(target_x_,target_y_,target_yaw_);
400  state_ = current_state::AUTONOMOUS;
401  }
402  }
403  }
404 }
405 void UnicornState::LiftCallback(const std_msgs::Int8& recieveMsg) // ADDED BY MUJI
406 {
407  if(recieveMsg.data==2)
408  {
409  ROS_INFO("ACK has been recieved! The liftsystem is working!");
410  }
411  if(recieveMsg.data==3)
412  {
413  ROS_INFO("Lifting is done!");
414  }
415 }
416 void UnicornState::active()
417 {
418  int c = getCharacter();
419  processKey(c);
420 
421  float current_range = 0;
422  for (std::map<std::string, RangeSensor*>::iterator it = range_sensor_list_.begin(); it != range_sensor_list_.end(); ++it)
423  {
424  current_range += it->second->getRange();
425  }
426 current_range /= range_sensor_list_.size();
427 
428  switch(state_)
429  {
430  case current_state::AUTONOMOUS:
431  if(move_base_clt_.getState() == actionlib::SimpleClientGoalState::SUCCEEDED)
432  {
433  ROS_INFO("[unicorn_statemachine] Goal reached");
434  state_ = current_state::IDLE;
435  //state_= current_state::LIFT;
436  //state_ = current_state::IDLE;
437  printUsage();
438  }
439  break;
440 
441  case current_state::MANUAL:
442  if (c == 'a')
443  {
444  if (man_cmd_vel_.angular.z < MAX_ANGULAR_VEL)
445  {
446 
447  man_cmd_vel_.angular.z += MAX_ANGULAR_VEL;
448 
449  }
450  }
451  else if (c == 'w')
452  {
453  man_cmd_vel_.linear.x = MAX_LINEAR_VEL;
454  man_cmd_vel_.angular.z = 0;
455  }
456  else if (c == 'd')
457  {
458  if (man_cmd_vel_.angular.z > -MAX_ANGULAR_VEL)
459  {
460  man_cmd_vel_.angular.z -= MAX_ANGULAR_VEL;
461  }
462 
463  }
464  else if (c == 's')
465  {
466  man_cmd_vel_.angular.z = 0;
467  man_cmd_vel_.linear.x = 0;
468  }
469  else if (c == 'x')
470  {
471  man_cmd_vel_.linear.x = -MAX_LINEAR_VEL;
472  man_cmd_vel_.angular.z = 0;
473  }
474  cmd_vel_pub_.publish(man_cmd_vel_);
475  break;
476 
477  case current_state::LOADING:
478  break;
479 
480  case current_state::LIFT:
481  //ROS_INFO("[unicorn_statemachine] lift signal is %d", lifted_); // Uncommented BY MUJI
482  // reversing_ = 0;
483  //if (lifted_ == 0 || lifted_ == 1)
484  // {}
485  //else
486  // {
487  // lifted_ == 0;
488  //}
489  // ROS_INFO("[unicorn_statemachine] lifter_: %d",lifted_);
490 
491 
492  //if (lifted_ == 0)
493  //{
494  // lift_.data = 1;
495  // lifted_ = 1;
496  // }
497  //else
498  //{
499  //lift_.data = 0;
500  //lifted_ = 0;
501  //}
502  //ROS_INFO("[unicorn_statemachine] send lift signal %d",lift_.data);
503  //lift_pub_.publish(lift_);
504 
505  ROS_INFO("Activation of the liftsystem is requested!");
506  ROS_INFO("Sending Messsage to the liftsystem!");
507  lift_.data=1;
508  lift_publisher.publish(lift_);
509  state_ = current_state::IDLE;
510  printUsage();
511  break;
512 
513  case current_state::ALIGNING:
514 
515  if (!move_base_active_)
516  {
517 
518  ROS_INFO("[unicorn_statemachine] Aligning with garbage disposal...");
519 
520  sendGoal(refuse_bin_pose_.x + 1.5*cos(refuse_bin_pose_.yaw)
521  ,refuse_bin_pose_.y + 1.5*sin(refuse_bin_pose_.yaw)
522  ,refuse_bin_pose_.yaw);
523  move_base_active_ = 1;
524 
525  return;
526  }
527  if (move_base_clt_.getState() == actionlib::SimpleClientGoalState::SUCCEEDED)
528  {
529  move_base_active_ = 0;
530  reversing_ = 1;
531  state_ = current_state::ENTERING;
532  //loading_state_ = current_state::ENTERING;
533  ROS_INFO("[unicorn_statemachine] Entering garbage disposal");
534  }
535  break;
539  case current_state::ENTERING:
540 
541  man_cmd_vel_.angular.z = 0;
542  reversing_ = 1;
543  man_cmd_vel_.linear.x = -0.2;
544 
545  ROS_INFO("Current vel: %f", current_vel_);
546  ROS_INFO("[unicorn_statemachine] bumperPressed_ %d", bumperPressed_);
547  if (bumperPressed_ == 1)
548  {
549  man_cmd_vel_.linear.x = 0.0;
550  cancelGoal();
551  state_ = current_state::LIFT;
552  ROS_INFO("[unicorn_statemachine] Entered garbage disposal. Waiting for exit signal");
553  }
554  else
555  {
556  man_cmd_vel_.linear.x = -0.1;
557  }
558 
559  cmd_vel_pub_.publish(man_cmd_vel_);
560 
561  break;
562 
563  case current_state::EXITING:
564  printUsage();
565  if (c == 'k')
566  {
567  ROS_INFO("[unicorn_statemachine] Exiting garbage disposal");
568  man_cmd_vel_.linear.x = 0.15;
569  }
570  {
571  man_cmd_vel_.linear.x = 0.0;
572  ROS_INFO("[unicorn_statemachine] Loading complete!");
573  state_ = current_state::IDLE;
574  printUsage();
575  }
576  cmd_vel_pub_.publish(man_cmd_vel_);
577  reversing_ = 0;
578  break;
579  }
580 }
581 
582 int UnicornState::sendGoal(const float& x, float y, float yaw)
583 {
584  try {
585  float check_input=boost::lexical_cast<float>(x);
586  } catch(boost::bad_lexical_cast &e) {
587  ROS_INFO("%s", e.what());
588  ROS_ERROR("[unicorn_statemachine] x is undefined");
589  state_ = current_state::IDLE;
590  return -1;
591  }
592  try {
593  float check_input=boost::lexical_cast<float>(y);
594  } catch(boost::bad_lexical_cast &) {
595  ROS_ERROR("[unicorn_statemachine] y is undefined");
596  state_ = current_state::IDLE;
597  return -1;
598  }
599  try {
600  float check_input=boost::lexical_cast<float>(yaw);
601  } catch(boost::bad_lexical_cast &) {
602  ROS_ERROR("[unicorn_statemachine] yaw is undefined");
603  state_ = current_state::IDLE;
604  return -1;
605  }
606  while(!move_base_clt_.waitForServer(ros::Duration(5.0)))
607  {
608  ROS_INFO("Waiting for the move_base action server to come up");
609  }
610 
611  move_base_msgs::MoveBaseGoal goal;
612  goal.target_pose.header.frame_id = "map";
613  goal.target_pose.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
614  goal.target_pose.pose.position.x = x;
615  goal.target_pose.pose.position.y = y;
616  goal.target_pose.pose.orientation = tf::createQuaternionMsgFromYaw(yaw);
617 
618  move_base_clt_.sendGoal(goal);
619 
620  return 1;
621 }
622 
623 void UnicornState::sendMoveCmd(float x, float y, float yaw)
624 {
625  try {
626  float check_input=boost::lexical_cast<float>(x);
627  } catch(boost::bad_lexical_cast &) {
628  ROS_ERROR("[unicorn_statemachine] x is undefined");
629  return;
630  }
631  try {
632  float check_input=boost::lexical_cast<float>(y);
633  } catch(boost::bad_lexical_cast &) {
634  ROS_ERROR("[unicorn_statemachine] y is undefined");
635  return;
636  }
637  try {
638  float check_input=boost::lexical_cast<float>(yaw);
639  } catch(boost::bad_lexical_cast &) {
640  ROS_ERROR("[unicorn_statemachine] yaw is undefined");
641  return;
642  }
643  while(!move_base_clt_.waitForServer(ros::Duration(5.0)))
644  {
645  ROS_INFO("Waiting for the move_base action server to come up");
646  }
647 
648  move_base_msgs::MoveBaseGoal goal;
649  goal.target_pose.header.frame_id = frame_id_.c_str();
650  goal.target_pose.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
651  goal.target_pose.pose.position.x = x;
652  goal.target_pose.pose.position.y = y;
653  goal.target_pose.pose.orientation = tf::createQuaternionMsgFromYaw(yaw);
654 
655  move_base_clt_.sendGoal(goal);
656 }
657 
658 
659 void UnicornState::cancelGoal()
660 {
661  actionlib_msgs::GoalID cancel_all;
662  move_base_cancel_pub_.publish(cancel_all);
663  ROS_INFO("[unicorn_statemachine] Canceling move_base goal");
664 }
665 
666 void UnicornState::giveOrder()
667 {
668  /* takes input to a goal in x,y and yaw */
669  float x,y,yaw;
670  std::cout << "Target x: ";
671  if(!getInput(x))
672  {
673 
674  return;
675  }
676  std::cout << "Target y: ";
677  if(!getInput(y))
678  {
679 
680  return;
681  }
682  std::cout << "Target yaw: ";
683  if(!getInput(yaw))
684  {
685 
686  return;
687  }
688  target_x_= x;
689  target_y_= y;
690  target_yaw_ = yaw;
691  sendGoal(x,y,yaw);
692 
693  /* Go to a given goal */
694  if(move_base_clt_.getState() == actionlib::SimpleClientGoalState::SUCCEEDED)
695  {
696  ROS_INFO("[unicorn_statemachine] Goal reached");
697  if (!holdingBin_)
698  {
699  reverse();
700  lift();
701  // do thit a little while to get away from the rack
702  man_cmd_vel_.angular.z = 0;
703  reversing_ = 1;
704  man_cmd_vel_.linear.x = 0.2;
705  cmd_vel_pub_.publish(man_cmd_vel_);
706  lift();
707  giveOrder();
708 
709  }
710  else if (holdingBin_)
711  {
712  lift();
713  reverse();
714  lift();
715  giveOrder();
716  }
717  }
718 }
719 
720 
721 void UnicornState::reverse()
722 {
723  man_cmd_vel_.angular.z = 0;
724  reversing_ = 1;
725  man_cmd_vel_.linear.x = -0.2;
726 
727  ROS_INFO("Current vel: %f", current_vel_);
728  ROS_INFO("[unicorn_statemachine] bumperPressed_ %d", bumperPressed_);
729  if (bumperPressed_ == 1)
730  {
731  man_cmd_vel_.linear.x = 0.0;
732  cancelGoal();
733  ROS_INFO("[unicorn_statemachine] Entered garbage disposal. Waiting for exit signal");
734  return;
735  }
736  else
737  {
738  man_cmd_vel_.linear.x = -0.1;
739  }
740 
741  cmd_vel_pub_.publish(man_cmd_vel_);
742 }
743 
744 void UnicornState::lift()
745 {
746  if (lifted_ == 0)
747  {
748  lift_.data = 1;
749  lifted_ = 1;
750  }
751  else
752  {
753  lift_.data = 0;
754  lifted_ = 0;
755  }
756  ROS_INFO("[unicorn_statemachine] send lift signal %d",lift_.data);
757  lift_pub_.publish(lift_);
758 }
